comment.author: Tage
comment.text: He wouldn't have the power to put her in jail.. Smh people you learn this stuff in school. Stop

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Tage . U are wrong. My wife being a Attorney said a President can open any Case that Questions National Security. I think my Wife would know more than u. She went to School got a Law Degree and is a actual Lawyer. Sorry but your Dead wrong. He can bring a IU investigation up and have her prosecuted

replies.author: Tage
replies.text: I'm dead wrong huh? So how exactly could he lock her up? It's not possible...
